title: New: Jamie Isaac – Can See
body:
After posting a new song from **Jamie Isaac** only last night, it’s with great pleasure that I bring you another cut from the teenage producer.

_Can See_ is a piano driven ballad, relying heavily on the vocal capabilities of **Isaac** and his lyrical prowess. Thematically the track is mournful and melancholic, filled with longing and remorse, and sure to pull on numerous heartstrings. Check out _Can See_ below.

_  
Water draining through these open clouds. See, my tears they run around_

_And I can’t see the way, no i can’t see your face._  
_Shifting along the edge._

_Shedding skin whilst sunlight beats on us. Though my tears are filled with lust._

_And i can See the way, yes i can see your face._  
_Drifting along the edge._
